TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DataBindingHandler extends System.Object

summary.span: 为数据绑定处理程序提供基类。

span.span: Provides a base class for a data-binding handler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为数据绑定处理程序提供基类。 provides a base class for data-binding handlers. 可以在设计器中使用数据绑定处理程序，以执行数据绑定以启用显示有意义的设计图面上的控件。A data-binding handler can be used within a designer to perform data-binding to enable a meaningful display of the control on the design surface. 通常，控件的设计器是负责此功能。Typically a control's designer is responsible for this functionality. 但是，当控件不是实时的设计图面上，如，在另一个控件模板中，它不具有设计器中，以及通过数据绑定处理程序提供此功能，如果使用指定的一个中控件的代码.However, when a control is not live on the design surface, such as within the template of another control, it does not have a designer, and this functionality is provided by a data-binding handler if one has been specified with a in the code for the control. 若要使用数据绑定处理程序，它具有数据绑定属性的控件必须具有其代码，指示要使用的数据绑定处理程序的类型中指定。To use a data-binding handler, the control which has the data-bound property or properties must have a specified within its code that indicates the type of data-binding handler to use. 例如，与关联控件类通过中的代码类。For example, the control is associated with the class through a in the code for the class. 中的模板、其 text 属性已被数据绑定的控件的标签上显示"数据绑定"一词。Within a template for a , a control whose text property has been data bound displays the word "DataBound" on the label. 如果数据绑定处理程序，没有标签将在设计时不可见，因为它没有设计器在设计时绑定其在模板化控件中的数据绑定属性。Without the data-binding handler, the label would be invisible at design-time, as it does not have a designer to bind its data-bound properties while in a templated control at design-time. 若要实现数据绑定处理程序，定义派生此类和实现的新类方法来设置相应的属性。To implement a data-binding handler, define a new class that derives from this class and implement the method to set the appropriate properties.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void DataBindControl (System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost designerHost, System.Web.UI.Control control);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void DataBindControl(class System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost designerHost, class System.Web.UI.Control control) cil managed
public: abstract void DataBindControl(System::ComponentModel::Design::IDesignerHost ^ designerHost, System::Web::UI::Control ^ control);

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在派生类提供的自定义数据绑定处理程序的功能，应实现此方法。This method should be implemented in a derived class to provide functionality to a custom data-binding handler. 数据绑定的逻辑应在此方法内实现，并可以是特定于类型或数据绑定处理程序是将绑定的属性或属性的类型。The logic for the data binding should be implemented within this method, and can be specific to the type or types that the data-binding handler is to bind a property or properties on.

para.span: 大多数数据绑定处理程序将需要检查在控件中的数据绑定集合使用接口，以确定它可以处理任何特定属性是数据绑定。

span.span: Most data binding handlers will need to examine the data bindings collection on the control, using the interface, to determine if any specific properties it can handle are data-bound.
